sentences.en: Engineers are still trying to come up with a commercially viable replacement for internal - combustion engines.
sentences.cn: 工程师在设法制造一种在商业上切实可行的发动机来取代内燃机.

sentences.en: Hormone replacement therapy is very important and should be instituted early.
sentences.cn: 激素替代治疗非常重要，应该及早开始。

sentences.en: If the warranty is limited, the terms may entitle you to a replacement or refund.
sentences.cn: 如果保修有限制，根据条款你也许可以要求退换或者退款。

sentences.en: On the death of Leo there were two main candidates for nomination as his replacement.
sentences.cn: 利奥去世后，有两个主要候选人被指定来接替他。

sentences.en: Our old car is badly in need of replacement.
Replacement is guaranteed if the products are not up to the standard.
sentences.cn: 产品不合规格,保证退换.

sentences.en: Replacement parts couldn't be found for love or money.
sentences.cn: 替换零件怎么都找不到。

sentences.en: Sending a replacement jet would have been uneconomic.
sentences.cn: 当时派一架喷气式飞机去替换的话，代价太大了。

sentences.en: She has been on hormone replacement therapy for four years and looks fantastic.
sentences.cn: 她接受激素替代治疗已经4年了，看起来容光焕发。

sentences.en: The 18-year-old made his debut last week as a replacement for the injured Gordon Durie.
sentences.cn: 这个18岁选手作为受伤的戈登·迪里的替补在上周首次出场。

sentences.en: The bike is in need of replacement.
The manager will make a special plea to draft the player into his squad as a replacement.
sentences.cn: 主教练将特别要求抽调这位运动员到他的队里做替补。

sentences.en: The original furnishings are now in need of replacement.
sentences.cn: 原来的家具陈设需要更换了.

sentences.en: Their threat to hire replacement workers has the union with its back to the wall.
sentences.cn: 他们威胁说要雇用替工，这使工会陷入了困境。

sentences.en: With conventional insurance policies it is difficult to work out accurately the replacement value of your possessions.
sentences.cn: 在传统的保险条款下，很难准确计算财产的重置价值。
